posts.post_content:
Posted By: Russ Bright
Another emergency is causing me to sell more of my cards quicker than I had anticipated - 

this is a GREAT way to pick up a good chunk of the T205 set ungraded - 10 or so were from a lot of Sovereign cards I bought in a Barry Sloate auction that the other cards came back SGC30-60 - there are 5 of the SUPER rare Piedmont 42 backs here - try to find as many in one lot! Cycle, American Beauty Green, Hassan - also included - short print cards - Kirby White, Ed Sweeney, Jiggs Donohue, George Wiltse (left ear only) - all these for 1000 shipped (insurance extra) - I know i spent more putting these together - here is the list with approximate conditions (i tried to undergrade)



Barger - (full B) - Poor - Piedmont Factory 25 (Topps T206 insert) 
Oakes - VG - American Beauty Green (Topps T205 Insert)
McIntyre - Good - Sovereign 
McConnell - Good - Piedmont Factory 25

e-mail me for scans or with questions - ambrosia2@hotmail.com

HOF also available:

Evers - Cycle - SGC30 --- $180
M. Brown - Hassan factory 30 - SGC40 --- $140 
Jennings - Sweet Cap Red - SGC20 --- $60
Huggins - Sovereign - SGC20 --- $60
Jennings - Sweet Cap Black - PSA3 --- $80

Edited for pricedrops

Posted By: Russ Bright
Pricedrop on all cards - we had an even bigger problem this week and i NEED to sell these - reasonable offers will be considered and most likely acepted -
